articles.title: European Commission's universal charging port deliberations might be finalized in June 2022 - Notebookcheck.net
articles.description: The European Commission (EC) has long been linked with a move to make all OEMs use the same charging port (more than likely USB type-C) in all mobile devices intended for use within its jurisdiction. A decision to enforce this resolution is now said to arrive…

articles.title: Fourth monkey pox case detected in NSW - Sky News Australia
articles.description: A man in his 30s is the fourth person to test positive for monkeypox in NSW, while another man is likely to become the state’s fifth case after the pair recently returned together from Europe.
articles.content: NSW Health said on Saturday two men aged in their 30s presented to their doctors with symptoms clinically compatible with monkeypox.A man in his 30s is the fourth person to test positive for monkeypo… [+1904 chars]
